meanings.sent1: She always precleans the dishes before putting them in the dishwasher.
meanings.sent2: Before the party, he precleans the house to make sure everything is spotless.
meanings.sent3: The cat precleans its fur before grooming itself thoroughly.
meanings.sent4: The diligent student precleans their study area before starting homework.
meanings.sent5: The chef precleans the kitchen to ensure a hygienic cooking environment.

meanings.sent1: Her precleans of the kitchen made the actual cleaning process much easier.
meanings.sent2: The precleans of the equipment saved time during the busy workday.
meanings.sent3: The precleans of the carwash made the cars sparkle even more.
meanings.sent4: The precleans of the classroom set the stage for a productive learning environment.
meanings.sent5: The precleans of the garden helped maintain its beauty throughout the season.
